Text: Can someone write how to fix it ?

1. go into the rarfix file you will see 2 files the rarfix16.r00 and the other one as rarfix16.rar dont rename anything! 2.right click on the rarfix16.r00 and click extract here 3. you will now see the complex_forzahorizon.r16 that you were looking for!
part R10  error how do i fix it??

Okay, "EVERYONE" go and download... FORZA.HORIZON.GERMAN.XBOX360-NSU-RF-MULTI5 from - http://bt.xbox-sky.cc:88/index.php?keywords=Forza+Xbox360+-+German&sort=&NoSeed=0

This is the one verified with abgx360 (green across the board and good to go). Yes, you will have to register to the site.

BEST PART IS... I DOWNLOADED IT, BURNED IT, AND AM NOW PLAYING IT ON MY XBOX AND XBOX LIVE WITH "ENGLISH" language. ENJOY! :)
